title: Driven to Dominate: The Story Behind Nathan MacKinnon’s Historic Run
description: Nathan MacKinnon is rewriting the record books while chasing one goal above all else: another championship for the Avalanche.
content:
DENVER  It does not seem to matter which milestone he reaches or which summit he climbsNathan MacKinnon carries himself with a quiet, almost disarming humility.
He is a player who never assumed he w… [+5448 chars]
de: Zur Dominanz getrieben: Die Geschichte hinter Nathan MacKinnons historischem Lauf. Nathan MacKinnon schreibt die Rekordbücher neu und verfolgt dabei vor allem ein Ziel: eine weitere Meisterschaft für die Avalanche.
en: Driven to Dominate: The Story Behind Nathan MacKinnon’s Historic Run. Nathan MacKinnon is rewriting the record books while chasing one goal above all else: another championship for the Avalanche.
la: Dominare pulsi: The Story Behind Nathan MacKinnon's Historic Run. Nathan MacKinnon recordum librorum recitat dum unum prae omnibus propositum persequimur: alterum patrocinium in Avalanche.
